data.name: kstidRecalculateDiff
data.comment: Used in the progress dialog when recalculating differences

data.name: kstidTextChanged
data.comment: Used in the diffTool window when the text was changed

data.name: kstidMissingParaStyle
data.comment: Used in the diffTool window when paragraph style is missing--indicates invalid condition

data.name: kstidCharacterStyleDiff
data.comment: Used in the diffTool window when there is a character style difference in a verse

data.name: kstidMultipleStyleDiffs
data.comment: Used in the diffTool window when there are multiple style differences in a verse

data.name: kstidFootnoteDifference
data.comment: Other descriptions of differences will be combined with this to describe differences within footnotes

data.name: kstidFootnoteDeleted
data.comment: Used in the diffTool window when a footnote was removed

data.name: kstidFootnoteAdded
data.comment: Used in the diffTool window when a footnote was added

data.name: kstidFootnoteDifferences
data.comment: Used in the diffTool window when there is are multiple footnote differences

data.name: kstidPictureDifference
data.comment: Used in the diffTool window when a change was made to a picture

data.name: kstidPictureMissing
data.comment: Used in the diffTool window when a picture is missing in the current

data.name: kstidVerseDeleted
data.comment: Used in the diffTool window when a verse was removed

data.name: kstidVerseAdded
data.comment: Used in the diffTool window when a verse was added

data.name: kstidParagraphDeleted
data.comment: Used in the diffTool window when one or more paragraphs were removed

data.name: kstidParagraphAdded
data.comment: Used in the diffTool window when one or more paragraphs were added

data.name: kstidStanzaBreakDeleted
data.comment: Used in the diffTool window when one or more stanza breaks were removed

data.name: kstidStanzaBreakAdded
data.comment: Used in the diffTool window when one or more stanza breaks were added

data.name: kstidParagraphSplit
data.comment: Used in the diffTool window when a paragraph is split

data.name: kstidParagraphMerged
data.comment: Used in the diffTool window when paragraphs are merged

data.name: kstidParagraphStructureChange
data.comment: Used in the diffTool window when the structure of paragraphs are changed

data.name: kstidSectionDeleted
data.comment: Used in the diffTool window when a section was removed

data.name: kstidSectionsDeleted
data.comment: Used in the diffTool window when multiple sections were removed

data.name: kstidSectionAdded
data.comment: Used in the diffTool window when a section was added

data.name: kstidSectionsAdded
data.comment: Used in the diffTool window when multiple sections were added

data.name: kstidSectionHeadDeleted
data.comment: Used in the diffTool window when a section head was removed

data.name: kstidSectionHeadAdded
data.comment: Used in the diffTool window when a section head was added

data.name: kstidVerseMoved
data.comment: Used in the diffTool window when a verse was moved

data.name: kstidVersesMoved
data.comment: Used in the diffTool window when multiple verses were moved

data.name: kstidZoom
data.comment: Displayed in the Zoom combo box

data.name: kstidPictureAdded
data.comment: Used in the diffTool window when a picture was added

data.name: kstidContentMissing
data.comment: Text displayed in the view when entire paragraph(s) are missing in one version but present in the other.

data.name: kstidWritingSystemDiff
data.comment: Used in the diffTool window when there is a writing system difference in the text

data.name: kstidMultipleWritingSystemDiffs
data.comment: Used in the diffTool window when there are multiple writing system differences in the text
